long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Laughing is the best medicine", This extension works on this concept and will make you laugh by delivering a new joke of multiple categories (Eg: Science, Dad, Misc etc.) whenever you click on it.
